title: JJO
description: Simple Job Board layout in Adobe XD. You will learn a lot about grids and or flex layouts as well as containers, Readme.md file included. Free.

title: Gourmet
description: Practice your HTML and CSS skills with the high quality Gourmet Adobe XD template, includes mega menu. Readme.md file included. Costs $5.

title: Price.io
description: Amazon Price Tracker. Lots of great layout challenges with various components and pages (and graphs!). Readme.md file included. Free.

title: Invitation
description: Practice your HTML and CSS skills with the Invitation Adobe XD template. 3 column grid practice (or flex). Readme.md file included. Free.

title: Pricing Page
description: Simple pricing page, 3 column grid, easy to implement, modern and simple. Readme.md file included. Absolutely free of charge.

title: Sign Up Page
description: Simple sign up page, 2 column grid, easy to implement, modern and simple. Readme.md file included. Absolutely free of charge.

title: desi.gn
description: A landing page for an unlimited revisions design agency. Great to work on your flex/grid layouts. Free of charge.
